Address: 27422 PORTOLA PARKWAY, SUITE 200, FOOTHILL RANCH, California, 92610-2831, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Kaiser Aluminum Corporation, a Delaware corporation, manufactures and sells semi-fabricated specialty aluminum mill products for the following end market applications: aerospace and high strength ("Aero/HS products"); automotive ("Automotive Extrusions"); general engineering ("GE products"); and other industrial ("Other products"). Our fabricated aluminum mill products include flat-rolled (plate and sheet), extruded (rod, bar, hollows and shapes), drawn (rod, bar, pipe and tube) and certain cast aluminum products. Our products are differentiated based on the metallurgy and physical properties of the metal and the special characteristics that are required for particular end uses.  ... More ...
